title: Twisted Steel
description: Twisted Steel: A Motorcycle Club Romance Anthology  Fourteen of your favorite MC authors have collaborated to bring you all new biker stories. Some clubs are known, while others are brand spanking new.  While each story takes place in a separate club, you can always count on copious amounts of danger, suspense and—most of all—angst.  We all know the common code of MCs. Will these men and women put their brotherhood above all else, or will they sacrifice everything for love?  This collection includes stories from Addison Jane, Erin Osborne, Nia Farrell, Chelle C. Craze, Dani René, Amy Davies, Elizabeth Knox, E.C. Land, Krista Ames, Letha Gene, Claire Shaw, Scarlett Black, Courtney Lynn Rose, & Rae B. Lake.
author: Elizabeth   Knox
